named-native-query.name: JobCompletedSessionsEntity.createTable
named-native-query.query: SELECT TOP 0 session_id INTO cc_job_completed_sessions FROM log.cc_job_session

named-native-query.name: JobCompletedSessionsEntity.insertJobSessionJob
JobCompletedSessionsEntity.insertJobSessionJobByStatus
JobCompletedSessionsEntity.insertJobSessionJobByOwnerRoleId
JobCompletedSessionsEntity.insertJobSessionJobByStatusAndOwnerRoleId
JobSessionEntity.deleteByJobCompletedSessions
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM log.cc_job_session WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM cc_job_completed_sessions)

named-native-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.deleteByJobCompletedSessions
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM setting.cc_notify_relation_info WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM cc_job_completed_sessions AS s WHERE notify_group_id LIKE 'JOB[_]SES-' + s.session_id + '%');

named-native-query.name: MonitorStatusEntity.deleteByJobCompletedSessions
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM setting.cc_monitor_status WHERE plugin_id='JOB' AND monitor_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM cc_job_completed_sessions)

named-native-query.name: NotifyHistoryEntity.deleteByJobCompletedSessions
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM setting.cc_notify_history WHERE plugin_id='JOB' AND monitor_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM cc_job_completed_sessions)
